excerpt: The TMC2209 breakout board is a development board with the dedicated TMC2209-LA chip. It is designed to give users the chance to rapidly prototype their applications - making it possible to immediately check how the motor performs with TMC chips while developing the application's software.Special FeaturesMicroPlyer™CoolStep™short detectionSpreadCycle™Stall detectionStealthChop2™StallGuard4™
